bow: what is the strangest most boneheaded piece of parenting advice you ve ever gotten mine is that my mom thinks that if baby ever puts something in their mouth it means they re hungry obviously have no memory of that part of my childhood but while babysitting my kids noticed her shoveling food into their mouths like crazy when asked what she was doing she told me that baby was putting blocks in her mouth when asked what the heck that has to do with anything she told me it was clear sign that baby was getting enough to eat tried to explain that it was normal developmental phase but she did believe me my so mother told me that if my daughter bites me while breastfeeding to just smack her on the back of her head wtf not only is that not okay but she also only months old well that just good advice and if that does work you can always fall back on waterboarding all of the advice from all of the people to stop breastfeeding baby is using you as pacifier after the first few weeks they do need breast milk there no benefit to breast milk over formula babies need to be weaned by or else their teeth will fall out on and on and on do know why other people were so obsessed with my boobs with your aunt most people seem to hate being tickled although my little one seems to be the exception her favorite phrase is more tickle mommy she loves being tickled lol grandparents always seem to like they did want it though oh no certainly would either but she annoyed me so much because he obviously enjoyed it and she know it ask anyway who likes to make blanket statements like that haha my
